text: Very easy to setup and though I have never done stairs before I was able to finish my stairs (cutting and fitting) in one afternoon.  It was a total of 19 treads and risers.  My neighbor had a pro do his stairs.  Took the pro over 3 weeks as he cut the boards wrong and they had to reorder the treads.  He came over to see mine thought my stairs were done much better.  Doing stairs, get it.  Ignore whiney reviews about quality.  The shipping tube it comes in will protect it.

I have a Jet band saw and I too have been dreaming about owning a fence, but aftr reading the reviews her all 36 of them I would not ever consider purchasing this attachment, You would think jet customer service would anser these customer complaints. Evidently they could care  less about us customers,, so MR Jet customer surface person thatk theis and stick it where the sun don't shine.  Yes I was a John deere salesman , partsman, if I treated my customer this way we would have had to lock doors soon.

This is the only car racing game you every need.  It can be taught in minuets to new players.  The game is at its heart a dice rolling game, so some of the decisions are out of your control but there is still enough strategy to make it feel like you are in control of your car.  The extra tracks are a most, the Germany and Spain expansion are very good tracks.  This is one of the few games that can play up to 10 players, which is super fun.

I'm really disappointed in this.  We got it for our son and after one adult driven test drive to see how the controls worked (with no major crashes...a few wall bumps and one ceiling touch, by far nothing hard enough to visibly damage it) and it would not lift off again after that.  No visible damage, no gears stripped, full charge...all it would do after the first 2 minute flight was spin on the ground.  It's repackaged and on it's way back to Amazon as I type.  Save your money.

This is a very Good game. It is so good. You get to play a lot of diffrent characters, like, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Qui-Gon Jinn, Queen Amidala & Captian Panaka. It woyuld be cool if they let you play Jar Jar Binks, but they don't. Oh, weel. Jar jar is one of my Favorite Characters in the film. the best part is you get to battle darth Maul. and it goes along with the movie too. This game rocks. This is a must have game for all star wars fans.If you liked this game then check out all of the other Star wars games

One of the first games released for the Dreamcast, House of the Dead 2 is an instant classic.  The game is identical to the arcade smash with the inclusion of exclusive Dreamcast levels, and the graphics and detailed zombies will leave your mouth watering.  The voice acting is pretty bad though, making the voice acting from the first Resident Evil look like Shakespearian acting, but that is overlooked by the shoot 'em up action.  A light gun is strongly recommended, but the standard DC controler works just as well, somewhat.

Despite my lack of experience with stairs, I managed to set them up effortlessly. I completed the cutting and fitting process in just one afternoon, despite having a total of 19 treads and risers. Interestingly, my neighbor opted for a professional but faced numerous complications, such as incorrect board cuts that required reordering treads. On seeing my stairs, my neighbor acknowledged that mine were superior. So, don't be deterred by critical reviews regarding the quality; the stairs are safeguarded within the shipping tube it arrives in.

Setting up the stairs was incredibly simple, and even though I had no prior experience in this domain, I managed to finish the cutting and fitting process in a single afternoon. The staircase consisted of 19 treads and risers in total. Interestingly, my neighbor decided to hire a professional for their staircase, but it took the expert over 3 weeks due to erroneous board cuts, leading to the reordering of treads. Upon examining my stairs, my neighbor admitted that mine were assembled much more effectively. So, when it comes to building stairs, don't pay attention to complaints about the quality; the shipping tube it comes in provides sufficient protection.

Owning a Jet band saw has made me desire a fence, but upon reading all 36 reviews, I can confidently say that I will never consider purchasing this attachment.
The numerous negative reviews about the fence attachment for the Jet band saw have deterred me from purchasing it, despite my initial desire for one.
It is disappointing that Jet's customer service seems to disregard the complaints raised by customers, reflecting a lack of concern for their satisfaction.
To the customer service representative at Jet, kindly take note of this feedback and pay no attention to it whatsoever.
My experience as a former John Deere salesman and partsman makes it clear that treating customers poorly can lead to dire consequences for a business.
Jet's disregard for customer complaints regarding the fence attachment is indicative of their indifference towards their customers' opinions.
You will never need any other car racing game. New players can quickly learn and grasp the game within minutes.

This game, primarily based on rolling dice, strikes a balance between certain decisions being beyond your control and providing enough strategic elements to make you feel like you have command over your car.
The additional tracks, especially the Germany and Spain expansion, are highly recommended and offer great racing experiences.
With the ability to accommodate up to 10 players, this game stands out as one of the few that guarantees an incredibly fun time.
This car racing game is unparalleled, as it incorporates a quick learning curve for novice players and skillful strategy for all participants.
Be it the Germany or Spain expansion, the extra tracks in this game are a must-have for a diverse and enjoyable racing experience.

I have a great deal of dissatisfaction with this item. We bought it for our son, but after a single test drive conducted by an adult to familiarize ourselves with the controls (resulting in a few minor collisions against walls and one brief contact with the ceiling, causing no visible harm), the toy failed to take flight again. There were no noticeable signs of damage, no gears that had been stripped, and it had a full battery charge. Following a mere two-minute flight, it merely spun on the ground. At this moment, we have carefully repackaged it and initiated the return process with Amazon. I strongly recommend avoiding this purchase to save your money.

This product has left me thoroughly disappointed. We bought it for our son, and after an initial test drive, overseen by an adult for control familiarization purposes (resulting in a few minor collisions with walls and a brief touch of the ceiling, causing no visible harm), the toy refused to take off again. There were no visible signs of damage, no stripped gears, and it was fully charged. However, after a brief two-minute flight, it could only spin on the ground. We have since repackaged it and initiated the return process with Amazon. My advice is to avoid wasting your money on this item.

This game is truly remarkable. It offers a wide selection of characters to play, such as Obi-Wan Kenobi, Qui-Gon Jinn, Queen Amidala, and Captain Panaka. It would have been amazing if Jar Jar Binks was also playable, but unfortunately, that's not the case. Nevertheless, I have a great fondness for Jar Jar as a character in the film. The highlight of the game is the thrilling battle against Darth Maul, while staying faithful to the movie's plot. This game is extraordinary and a must-have for any Star Wars fan. If you enjoyed this game, be sure to explore the other Star Wars games available.

The game is exceptionally well-made. It provides players with the opportunity to assume various character roles like Obi-Wan Kenobi, Qui-Gon Jinn, Queen Amidala, and Captain Panaka. While it would be nice to also play as Jar Jar Binks, unfortunately, that option is not available. Nevertheless, Jar Jar remains one of my favorite characters in the film. The most enjoyable part is engaging in battles against Darth Maul, all while following the storyline of the movie. In summary, this game is absolutely fantastic and is a must-have for any Star Wars fan. If you found this game enjoyable, don't forget to explore the other Star Wars games as well.

The Dreamcast's early days saw the release of House of the Dead 2, instantly establishing it as a classic game. It faithfully recreates the popular arcade experience and even introduces exclusive levels for Dreamcast players. The highly-detailed graphics and zombie animations are sure to impress. Despite the subpar voice acting, which pales in comparison to the first Resident Evil's performances, the game's intense shooting action more than makes up for it. While a light gun is the recommended choice, the standard Dreamcast controller works adequately, albeit with some limitations.

Considered a timeless classic, House of the Dead 2 was among the earliest games available for the Dreamcast system. It faithfully captures the essence of the beloved arcade hit, while also incorporating Dreamcast-exclusive levels. The game boasts impressive graphics and intricately designed zombies that will undoubtedly pique players' interest. Although the voice acting leaves something to be desired, noticeably pale in comparison to the theatrical performances of the first Resident Evil, this flaw is easily overshadowed by the game's action-packed shoot 'em up gameplay. While a light gun is strongly suggested for optimal enjoyment, the standard Dreamcast controller can suffice, albeit with some compromises.

An instant classic, House of the Dead 2 was one of the pioneering games released for the Dreamcast console. It faithfully mirrors the popular arcade sensation, adding exclusive levels tailored for Dreamcast players. With visually stunning graphics and meticulously crafted zombies, it's guaranteed to whet players' appetite. Despite the subpar voice acting, which falls significantly short compared to the first Resident Evil's theatrical performances, the game's action-packed shooting sequences more than compensate. While a light gun is highly recommended, the standard Dreamcast controller also suffices, albeit with some limitations.

House of the Dead 2, an early Dreamcast release, quickly became a timeless gem. The game faithfully recreates the immersive arcade experience, making it an instant hit among Dreamcast players. It comes with exclusive levels designed specifically for the Dreamcast version, complementing the already impressive gameplay. The detailed graphics and intricately animated zombies add to the game's visual appeal. Despite lackluster voice acting, pale in comparison to the performances in the first Resident Evil, the game's intense shooting action overshadows this flaw. While a light gun is the ideal companion, the standard Dreamcast controller can also be used, albeit with some compromises.

Instantly joining the ranks of classics, House of the Dead 2 marked one of the earliest releases for the Dreamcast console. Despite the mediocre voice acting, which pales significantly when compared to the first Resident Evil's theatrical performances, the game compensates with its exhilarating shoot 'em up gameplay. While a light gun is strongly recommended, the standard Dreamcast controller suffices, albeit with some limitations.

Enter the realm of classics with House of the Dead 2, counted among the initial games to grace the Dreamcast console. This game faithfully translates the immersive arcade experience, while adding exclusive levels reserved for Dreamcast players. Prepare to be mesmerized by the stunning graphics and meticulously crafted zombies. Although the voice acting falls short of expectation, even in comparison to the first Resident Evil's dramatic performances, the game's adrenaline-pumping shooting sequences more than make up for it. While a light gun is the ultimate choice, the standard Dreamcast controller works passably, though not without some compromises.
